Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 12th overall pick, by Cincinnati in 2011...
Injured on 6/13/2013 with a Bruised Foot, out for 3 days...
Traded from Cincinnati to Los Angeles (N) on 7/28/2015 (Going to CIN: 1B N. Janousek, CF S. Victorino. Going to LAN: 1B C. Cron)...
Had first career hit on 4/4/2016, off David Herndon (SDN)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/5/2016, off Earl Lipton (SDN)...
Won Rookie of the Year Award in 2016, hitting .272 with 46 HR, 124 RBI...
